channel.title: All the products on LoSpeziale
channel.description: Recent content in All the products on LoSpeziale

item.title: Chili jam
item.description: Chili pepper jam: sweetens but at the same time leaves a spicy note.

item.title: Chili peppers pickles
item.description: Pickles are tasty and melt in your mouth. Great for enriching your compositions, special as an appetizer.

item.title: Chili powder
item.description: Chili powder: it can never be missing in the kitchen. Extremely versatile, it is special to flavor and make more interesting every kind of dish.

item.title: Chili salt
item.description: Chili salt: perfect for flavoring dishes. Just a pinch of salt and you’re done!

item.title: Spicy oil
item.description: Chily oil: enhance flavour of your dishes it’s never been so easy.

item.title: Spicy sauce
item.description: Spicy sauce: our client’s best choice since it can be used everywhere, with all dishes. Try it with meet, vegetables, pasta and toasts to get the most out of it!
